thread.section_title: Gamecheap Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Gamecheap | gamecheap.net
thread.title: Gisela H

author: Gisela H
title: Gisela H
text: Was looking to buy Microsoft Office and as a bargain hunter and a stay-at-home mom with a limited budget, I was looking for the best buy I could get. Found an amazing deal with this company and thought that it must be too good to be true...so I searched for reviews on the net and it seemed legit. But before I bought it, I chatted with their awesome customer service on their online chat and he was able to explain to me why it was so inexpensive compared to other places . I went ahead and placed the order...not only was the price the best available...they actually upgraded what i ordered. I am over the moon happy with this company and recommend them to anyone and everyone!!
